    • usingReadItems

      public void usingReadItems(String filename)
      Method usingReadItems - Essentially as suggested this method functions as a way to implement readItems method and sort through the MenuItem Array List into other array List of its object type, such as Entree, Side, Salad, or Dessert.
      Parameters:
      fileName - - String - relative file path that path should be set too

    • maxCaloriesMenu

      public static Menu maxCaloriesMenu(String name)
      Method maxCaloriesMenu - reads through the arrayLists contained within MenuManager class and generates the highest calories menu using multiple for loops - type Menu
      Parameters:
      name - - String - name of the highest calories menu that you are generating
      Returns:
      the generated Maximum Calories Menu
